I share here some software and datasets I’ve created or cleaned that may be useful to other researchers.

## Packages

### tvsc  
**Language**: Stata  
**Description**: Stata command to generate covariate balance tables in a publication-ready format.  
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/tvsc)

### eleccionesNic  
**Language**: R  
**Description**: R package to access presidential election results in Nicaragua from 1990 to 2006.  
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/eleccionesNic)

## Data Repositories

### National Police of Nicaragua  
**Description**: Scraped official reports with information on crime types, complaints, and solved cases (1980–2019) at the department level. First publicly available tidy dataset on Nicaraguan crime.  
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/policia-nacional-nic-stats)

### Instituto de Medicina Legal  
**Description**: Scraped official reports on violence typologies and total cases by medical jurisdiction.  
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/iml_nicaragua)

### Instituto Nicaragüense de Seguridad Social  
**Description**: Scraped official reports with annual totals of insured individuals by gender.  
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/inss_nicaragua)

### COVID-19 Nicaragua (Observatorio Ciudadano)  
**Description**: Scraped non-official COVID-19 reports from Observatorio Ciudadano with case counts and deaths at national and department level.  
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/observatorio-covid-nicaragua)

### Nicaraguan Rulers  
**Description**: Hand-coded dataset of Nicaraguan rulers from 1508 to 2020.
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/nicaraguan-rulers)

### Nicaraguan Population — 18th and 19th Century  
**Description**: Digitized historical population data from archival sources for the 1700s and 1800s.  
**Repository**: [{{< iconify bi:github >}}](https://github.com/RRMaximiliano/poblacion-nicaragua-siglo-18-19)

### Political Prisoners Dataset (Apr 2018 – Apr 2019)  
**Description**: Data on individuals imprisoned during the Nicaraguan protests. Based on public reports from Comité Pro Liberación de Presas y Presos Políticos.  
**Data files**:  
[RDS](/files/data/presos_politicos_1_abr_2019.rds) | [Stata](/files/data/presos_politicos_1_abr_2019.dta) | [CSV](/files/data/presos_politicos_1_abr_2019.csv)
